any.name: Simmered Fruit
any.description: This sweet dish is made by heaping tasty fruits into a pan and simmering until tender.

any.name: Steamed Fruit
any.description: A regional dish made by steaming near-ripened fruits in the leaves of fragrant plants.

any.name: Steamed Fruit
any.description: A regional dish made by steaming near-ripened fruits in the leaves of fragrant plants.

any.name: Fruit and Mushroom Mix
any.description: This dish contrasts the sweetness of fruit with the savoriness of mushrooms.

any.name: Fruit Pie
any.description: A celebration isn't a celebration until this fruit-filled crust hits the table!

any.name: Honeyed Fruits
any.description: A dish that combines the thick sweetness of honey with the acidity of sour fruits.

apple.name: Apple Pie
apple.description: The crispy, flaky pie crust and sweet apples are a match made in heaven.

apple.name: Fruitcake
apple.description: Making ample use of fruits found all over Hyrule, this cake is a must for celebrations.

apple.name: Hot Buttered Apple
apple.description: The apple's sweetness has been enhanced by smothering it with butter and baking it.

apple.name: Honeyed Apple
apple.description: A juicy sweet-and-sour dish combining newly ripened apples with honey.

pepper.name: Sautéed Peppers
pepper.description: The spiciness of these sautéed peppers has been broken by the heat for a sweeter taste.

banana.name: Fried Bananas
banana.description: Children love fried mighty bananas. The trick is frying them over very high heat.

any.name: Creamy Meat Soup
any.description: This nutritious soup contains serious portions of lightly-braised meat and many vegetables.

any.name: Creamy Meat Soup
any.description: This nutritious soup contains serious portions of lightly-braised meat and many vegetables.

any.name: Steamed Meat
any.description: This meat dish has been wrapped in fragrant leaves and steamed to preserve its moisture.

any.name: Steamed Meat
any.description: This meat dish has been wrapped in fragrant leaves and steamed to preserve its moisture.

any.name: Meat Pie
any.description: You'll need an extra napkin to deal with this juicy pie of perfectly baked minced meat.

any.name: Meat and Mushroom Skewer
any.description: A filling dish made by grilling various mountain ingredients with either Steak or Bird Meat.

any.name: Glazed Meat
any.description: The sweetness of the honey permeates the meat, giving it a complex taste profile.

any.name: Pepper Steak
any.description: A dish made by cooking meat in crushed peppers, suppressing the gamy taste while accentuating its flavor.

any.name: Meaty Rice Balls
any.description: The sweet and spicy meat stuffed into these rice balls will keep you full for some time.

any.name: Meat Skewer
any.description: A juicy, filling snack made by grilling small chunks of meat on a skewer.

any.name: Meat Stew
any.description: The hearty meat in this mainstay dish leaves bellies satisfied all throughout Hyrule.

any.name: Meat and Seafood Fry
any.description: A filling dish made by cooking fresh seafood and meat together.

any.name: Salt-Grilled Meat
any.description: Short on ingredients? Just rub some meat in salt and cook it for a simple, tasty dish.

any.name: Meat and Rice Bowl
any.description: This dish of rice and lightly seared meat is a mainstay all throughout Hyrule.

any.name: Spiced Meat Skewer
any.description: A special Goron spice covers up the scent of the meat, allowing its flavor to shine.

poultry.name: Poultry Pilaf
poultry.description: Sautéed Hylian rice steamed in poultry broth. Cook on low heat until the rice is fluffy.

poultry.name: Poultry Curry
poultry.description: The savory meat pairs well with the aroma of spice in this common curry.

any.name: Prime Meat Stew
any.description: Letting the large portions of choice cuts of meat simmer brought out their savoriness.

any.name: Prime Meat and Seafood Fry
any.description: This comfort dish is made with choice cuts of meat and seafood.

any.name: Salt-Grilled Prime Meat
any.description: A simple yet exquisite dish made by grilling high-quality meat on top of rock salt.

any.name: Prime Meat and Rice Bowl
any.description: This bowl is loaded with high-quality meat. Your hunt for a serious meal ends here.

any.name: Prime Spiced Meat Skewer
any.description: The simple preparation of this steak dish belies its complex taste profile.

venison.name: Prime Meat Curry
venison.description: The high-quality meat in this curry has given it a deeper taste than most other curries.

poultry.name: Prime Poultry Pilaf
poultry.description: The rice permeates the savory taste of the poultry in this Gerudo-region favorite.

poultry.name: Prime Poultry Curry
poultry.description: The secret to this curry's flavor is taking it off the heat while you add the spices.

any.name: Gourmet Meat Stew
any.description: The meat has simmered for so long it melts in your mouth. A true bucket-list meal!

any.name: Gourmet Meat and Seafood Fry
any.description: A marriage of the choicest cuts of meat and seafood. As delicious as it is filling!

any.name: Salt-Grilled Gourmet Meat
any.description: This lavish grilled dish makes liberal use of high-quality cuts of meat.

any.name: Gourmet Meat and Rice Bowl
any.description: Only the most carefully selected cuts of high-quality meats go into this dish.

any.name: Gourmet Spiced Meat Skewer
any.description: The rich aroma and juicy texture of this high-quality meat puts it in a league of its own.

venison.name: Gourmet Meat Curry
venison.description: The high-quality meat used in this prized dish satisfies meat and curry lovers alike.

poultry.name: Gourmet Poultry Pilaf
poultry.description: Made with the highest-quality poultry, every bite of this pilaf floods your mouth with flavor.

poultry.name: Gourmet Poultry curry
poultry.description: Once served in Hyrule Castle, the poultry used in this dish is of immensely high quality.

any.name: Creamy Seafood Soup
any.description: Thuck-cut chunks of seafood and stock provides a satisfying savoriness.

any.name: Creamy Seafood Soup
any.description: Thuck-cut chunks of seafood and stock provides a satisfying savoriness.

any.name: Fish Pie
any.description: A mainstay in any fisherman's home, the crisp crust pairs well with the fishy flavor.

any.name: Glazed Seafood
any.description: A seafood dish that you can actually wolf down whole!

any.name: Pepper Seafood
any.description: The pepper seeds grilled with this seafood draw out its taste and pleasant aroma.

any.name: Steamed Fish
any.description: A refined dish made by wrapping a fresh fish in fragrant wild greens and cooking it.

any.name: Steamed Fish
any.description: A refined dish made by wrapping a fresh fish in fragrant wild greens and cooking it.

any.name: Seafood Meunière
any.description: Rich butter flanks fresh seafood. The secret ingredient is lots and lots of love.

any.name: Seafood Rice Balls
any.description: Stuffed with aromatic seafood, the flavor can vary by ingredients but never disappoints.

any.name: Seafood Skewer
any.description: The natural water in this medley of seafaring creatures makes for a delicious broth.

porgy.name: Seafood Paella
porgy.description: No fisherman's birthday bash would be complete without this top-shelf seafood dish.

porgy.name: Porgy Meunière
porgy.description: Popular among residents of coastal regions, this juicy porgy is a delish dish.

porgy.name: Seafood Curry
porgy.description: This dish brims with treasures from the sea. Its spice packs a kick, so it's not for kids.

porgy.name: Seafood Fried Rice
porgy.description: Various seafood has been sautéed with rice. The stronger the flame, the tastier the dish!

salmon.name: Salmon Risotto
salmon.description: The rice used in this rich risotto permeates the light flavor of the salmon.

salmon.name: Salmon Meunière
salmon.description: The crispy skin of this fried hearty salmon puts its texture in a class all its own.

snail.name: Clam Chowder
snail.description: The nutritional value of hearty blueshell snail combines with butter and milk in a rich soup.

snail.name: Seafood Curry
snail.description: This dish brims with treasures from the sea. Its spice packs a kick, so it's not for kids.

snail.name: Seafood Fried Rice
snail.description: Various seafood has been sautéed with rice. The stronger the flame, the tastier the dish!

fish.name: Fish and Mushroom Skewer
fish.description: A simple dish made by cooking skewered, fresh fish alongside fragrant mushrooms.

fish.name: Salt-Grilled Fish
fish.description: A simple dish made by rolling a whole fish in natural rock salt before grilling it.

crab.name: Crab Risotto
crab.description: An everyday stable of seaside villages, the secret to its delicious flavor lies in crab fat.

crab.name: Crab Omelet with Rice
crab.description: The fluffy crab legs pair perfectly with the rice for a truly scrumptious dish.

crab.name: Crab Stir-Fry
crab.description: The Goron spice used in preparing this crab pairs perfectly with the flavor of the meat.

crab.name: Salt-Grilled Crab
crab.description: Nine out of ten fishermen agree: crab is best enjoyed grilled and with just a bit of salt.

any.name: Vegetable Omelet
any.description: This home-style dish mixes fluffy eggs with chopped vegetables for nutritional balance.

any.name: Cream of Vegetable Soup
any.description: Made by simmering vegetables in milk, this healthy dish is as simple as the ingredients.

any.name: Glazed Veggies
any.description: Don't like the taste of vegetables? Simply sauté them in honey for a salty-sweet flavor!

any.name: Salt-Grilled Greens
any.description: A health-boosting dish made with leafy greens and a touch of salt.

any.name: Veggie Rice Balls
any.description: This home-style dish of Kakariko Village is stuffed with the bounty of the mountains.

any.name: Herb Sauté
any.description: A fragrant mixture of herbs and spices. It's easily recognized by its unique aroma.

any.name: Fried Wild Greens
any.description: A basic vegetable dish made by sautéing fresh wild plants.

pumpkin.name: Pumpkin Pie
pumpkin.description: The intense sweetness of fortified pumpkins makes this dessert popular among children.

pumpkin.name: Pumpkin Stew
pumpkin.description: Simply simmer a fortified pumpkin to make this dish. A favorite in Kakariko Village.

pumpkin.name: Vegetable Risotto
pumpkin.description: The sweetness of the ingredients gives this risotto a mild flavor.

pumpkin.name: Veggie Cream Soup
pumpkin.description: This creamy soup showcases the sweetness of vegetables in a veritable taste explosion.

pumpkin.name: Vegetable Curry
pumpkin.description: This healthy curry is popular for its mild flavor and moderate spiciness.

pumpkin.name: Meat-Stuffed Pumpkin
pumpkin.description: This hollow, meat-filled fortified pumpkin is a local specialty or Kakariko Village.

carrot.name: Carrot Cake
carrot.description: Even those who don't like carrots tend to enjoy the mild sweetness of this cake.

carrot.name: Carrot Stew
carrot.description: This simple stew sat simmering for a long time to bring out the sweetness of the carrots.

carrot.name: Vegetable Risotto
carrot.description: The sweetness of the ingredients gives this risotto a mild flavor.

carrot.name: Veggie Cream Soup
carrot.description: This creamy soup showcases the sweetness of vegetables in a veritable taste explosion.

carrot.name: Vegetable Curry
carrot.description: This healthy curry is popular for its mild flavor and moderate spiciness.

radish.name: Creamy Heart soup
radish.description: Enjoying this sweet soup with another person will bring you both closer together.

any.name: Vegetable Omelet
any.description: This home-style dish mixes fluffy eggs with chopped vegetables for nutritional balance.

any.name: Cream of Vegetable Soup
any.description: Made by simmering vegetables in milk, this healthy dish is as simple as the ingredients.

any.name: Glazed Veggies
any.description: Don't like the taste of vegetables? Simply sauté them in honey for a salty-sweet flavor!

any.name: Salt-Grilled Greens
any.description: A health-boosting dish made with leafy greens and a touch of salt.

any.name: Veggie Rice Balls
any.description: This home-style dish of Kakariko Village is stuffed with the bounty of the mountains.

any.name: Herb Sauté
any.description: A fragrant mixture of herbs and spices. It's easily recognized by its unique aroma.

any.name: Fried Wild Greens
any.description: A basic vegetable dish made by sautéing fresh wild plants.

any.name: Mushroom Omelet
any.description: The fluffy texture of this omelet is one of the great joys of this dish, as well as life.

any.name: Mushroom Risotto
any.description: The creamy mushroom and vegetable soup is so chunky it eats like a meal!

any.name: Cream of Mushroom Soup
any.description: The creamy mushroom and vegetable soup is so chunky it eats like a meal!

any.name: Steamed Mushrooms
any.description: A healthy vegetable dish achieved by steaming mushrooms in plant leaves.

any.name: Steamed Mushrooms
any.description: A healthy vegetable dish achieved by steaming mushrooms in plant leaves.

any.name: Mushroom Rice Balls
any.description: The aroma of the mushrooms tickles your nose as you peel back the leafy wrapping.

any.name: Fragrant Mushroom Sauté
any.description: The fragrant aroma of this sautéed spice and mushroom dish makes your mouth water.

any.name: Salt-Grilled Mushrooms
any.description: A basic mushroom dish made by lightly salting mushrooms and grilling them.

any.name: Glazed Mushrooms
any.description: The honey in this mushroom dish gives it a sweet, complex taste and a savory finish.

any.name: Mushroom skewer
any.description: This simple mushroom-packed skewer has its colorful presentation to thank for its appeal.

egg.name: Plain Crepe
egg.description: The simplicity of this dish lets the flavor of its ingredients shine.

egg.name: Honey Crepe
egg.description: Honey has been drizzled over thin crepes to bring out their natural sweetness and flavor.

egg.name: Wildberry Crepe
egg.description: Sweet, tart wildberries are folded into thin, springy dough to make this dessert.

egg.name: Egg Pudding
egg.description: Made by cooking eggs and milk in a special mold, its soft texture melts in your mouth.

egg.name: Egg Tart
egg.description: You'll know this simple dessert is done baking when it smells just delightful.

egg.name: Omelet
egg.description: This simple dish is common all over Hyrule. Simply fry egg until it's nice and plump.

rice.name: Fried Egg and Rice
rice.description: The soft egg yolk pairs well with the fresh rice in this simple dish.

rice.name: Curry Pilaf
rice.description: The goron spice used in this pilaf has given it a rich, spicy aroma.

rice.name: Curry Rice
rice.description: A favorite all over Hyrule, this simple dish has a flavor you just won't get tired of.

wheat.name: Wheat Bread
wheat.description: Made with wheat from the Tabantha region, this soft, springy bread smells just heavenly.

nut.name: Sautéed Nuts
nut.description: These sautéed tree seeds are the perfect snack for the busy adventurer on the go!

nut.name: Nutcake
nut.description: Forest nuts give this cake a pleasant texture and a simple, understated sweetness.

honey.name: Honey Candy
honey.description: A natural sweet, brimming with nutrition and made by stewing fresh honey.

wood.name: Rock-hard Food
wood.description: A dish gone awry after adding the wrong ingredient. Chewing your way through this won't be fun, but it will fill you up when you're between a rock and a hard place.

milk.name: Warm Milk
milk.description: Make this by heating up some milk. Drink it before bed to ensure a good night's sleep.

fairy.name: Fairy Tonic
fairy.description: This powerful recovery elixir harnesses the power of fairies. It has a sweet fragrance.

extract.name: Monster Cake
extract.description: It's said that once you have a taste of this cake, you'll never forget its sweetness.

extract.name: Monster Curry
extract.description: This unusual take on curry uses monster extract and doesn't rely on spices.

extract.name: Monster Rice Balls
extract.description: Rice balls flavored with monster extract. Their unique aroma is not for everyone.

extract.name: Monster Soup
extract.description: Using monster extract as a base, this soup's distinct gaminess is either loved or hated.

extract.name: Monster Stew
extract.description: Meat and seafood simmered in monster extract. A savory dish despite its ingredients.
